title: Fu Hui Ci Yuan Vegetarian Cultural Restaurant
description: Fine dining ambiance, associated with Buddhist organization. No onion, garlic, shallot, chive, or leek used. Also caters to the mass vegetarian office workers by having weekday lunchtime pack meal at around RMB10, 15, 20. Try the blueberry mountain yam mashed placed on top of individual piece of hawthorn.  Direction: Follow Dong'anmen St west until you get to Golden Jaguar, turn right and walk 100 meters, you'll see a red sign pointing right, go down that street (Xila Hutong) for 50 meters.
